abstract.p: Judy Shampanier letter on Felicia R Lee's July 9 Coping column on baby quilt notes huppa quilt that was made for her wedding (S)

block.p: The baby quilt discussed in Felicia R. Lee's July 9 Coping column is a lovely idea. For my wedding last July, we put together a huppa quilt. We sent squares of white fabric to about 60 close friends and family members and asked them to contribute. After untold hours of labor on my mother's part, we had an enormous mosaic.
The squares ranged from family photos, screened onto the fabric, to embroideries and cross-stitches, to my husband's family crest, to abstract art, quotes and children's drawings.
